Package com.qtfx.lib.db

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Calculator
    Interface for calculated fields in a record.
    Persistor
    Interface that should implement back end persistence engines that operate with records of views.
    PersistorDDL
    Interface that should implement back end data definition.
    RecordIterator
    A simple record iterator used to iterate forward only cursors.
    RecordSetCustomizer
    A customizer of a recordset.
    Transaction
    An abstract transaction implemented on persistors.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Condition
    A condition used to build filtering criteria.
    Criteria
    A criteria to filter entities.
    Criteria.Segment
    A criteria segment is a list of conditions related with an operator, either OR or AND.
    Field
    Definition a an item usually of tabular data.
    Field.PossibleValue
    A possible value is a pair value-label.
    FieldGroup
    A group of fields within a table or view.
    FieldList
    A field list packs a list of field, its field map, the primary key pointers and the order key pointers if applicable.
    FieldProperties
    Provides field metadata as fields of the fields properties.
    Filter
    Filters are used to build complex WHERE clauses programmatic.
    Filter.Segment
    A filter segment can be a filter itself, a stringor a list of values.
    ForeignKey
    A table foreign key.
    Index
    An index definition, normally the index of a table in an SQL database.
    MetaData
    A manager of the underlying database engine JDBC meta data.
    Order
    An order definition.
    Order.Segment
    An order segment is a small structure to pack order segment information.
    OrderKey
    An order key.
    OrderKey.Segment
    An order key segment is a small structure to pack segment (value,asc/desc) information.
    PageRecordSet
    A PageRecordSet is a RecordSet that first paginates the underliying Persistor and Criteria.
    Record
    A record packs a list of values and their corresponding field definitions.
    RecordComparator
    A comparator useful to compare records and sort them within a record set or list.
    RecordSet
    A RecordSet packs a list of records.
    Relation
    A relation between two tables.
    Table
    A table definition.
    TableLink
    A link between a local and a foreign table.
    TableLink.Segment  
    Validator<T>
    A generic class to validate the convenience of a given type for a certain operation.
    Value
    An immutable value of supported types.
    ValueMap
    A map of values, that are indexed or keyed either by: A string when referred by alias, storing pairs of strings and values.
    View
    An SQL database view, build with a master table and relations.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Condition.Operator
    Enumeration constants of Operators.
    Filter.Like
    Enumerate the possible like conditions.
    Filter.Usage
    Enumerate the possible filter usages.
    ForeignKey.OnDelete
    Enumerate the ON DELETE actions
    Relation.Category
    Relation categories are ONE_TO_ONE, ONE_TO_MANY, MANY_TO_ONE
    Relation.Type
    A relation type describes the type of a relation.
    Types
    Types supported by the system.
    ValueMap.Type
    Map types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PersistorException
    Exceptions issued by persistors.
